Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Digital Earth Africa (DE Africa) provides free and open access to a copy of Landsat Collection 2 Level-2 products over Africa. These products are produced and provided by the United States Geological Survey (USGS). The Landsat series of Earth Observation satellites, jointly led by USGS and NASA, have been continuously acquiring images of the Earthâ€™s land surface since 1972. DE Africa provides data from Landsat 5, 7 and 8 satellites, including historical observations dating back to late 1980s and regularly updated new acquisitions.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We have ready to use lotus to prepare car files in the next step. We've already downloaded data to our storage server and we support both online and offline transfer with SPs.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, Africa, North America, Europe
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives, Lotus built-in data transfer
